page.title: 05The Landscape
page.content: The{landscape}around Tadcaster is typical of a small country town.In the middle of Tadcaster there are{housing} estates and breweries, and anybody would think that they were in the mniddle of a large town, but as soon as you get away from that it is open countryside. Close by is the{by-pass} which is very noisy but takes the traffic away from the heart of the town. The town is surrounded by fields, most of which are cultivated, not many being used for grazing. The River Wharfe cuts the town in two and provides good{fishing.}There are a number of very nice walks in and around Tadcaster.
